text: @DogOnTheRoof @veetocorleone @dingbattus You just called a black man stupid wyd???

@veetocorleone @dingbattus Now I have to make assumptions. Either you're too stupid to read up on the subject from any even mildly reputable source, or you know it's not true but like pushing the idea anyway. 

I can't read your mind, I don't know if you'd support the idea because you're stupid or a liar.

@veetocorleone @dingbattus You can determine somebody's outcomes from a postal or zip code more accurately than you can from race. 

"White people are genetically smarter than black people" is a racist statement. Say you actually believe it and think it's not racist because it's "true."

@DogOnTheRoof @dingbattus I've looked into it quite a bit. I don't see the belief that there's a genetic contribution to human intelligence and that intelligence varies amongst individuals, and thus on average amongst races, to be a racist idea
@DogOnTheRoof @dingbattus Being a supporter of theories of race and IQ is racist? His suggestion about Africa conquering Europe sounds a lot more ignorant and stupid than racist to me.

@veetocorleone @dingbattus Big supporter of theories of race and iq. Said if race didn't matter to intelligence that African would have conquered Europe. Gave pages of his paper to Murray about his book the bell curve, and refused to publish a rebuttal from Gould.

All in all not a great history.
@DogOnTheRoof @dingbattus Well what did he say that was racist besides this
@veetocorleone @dingbattus The tweet is not the only thing sullen has written and in fact has a connection to other things.
@dingbattus What claim did he make in that tweet?
@veetocorleone He has no claim to make the conclusions he has based on the evidence he has observed. In other words he's making shit up.
@aerospace_alex Hilarious but what is wrong with what he said
